name: morphological

biology
  specialized relating to the scientific study of the structure and form of animals and plants: The lizards were examined for a number of morphological characteristics such as body proportions and colour. morphological abnormalities in the brain
language
  specialized relating to the study of the form of words and phrases: The programs carry out lexical, morphological, and syntactic analysis of the source text. morphological inflections on Italian verbs See
morphology
More examplesFewer examplesbiochemical and morphological variation among individual seeds within a populationAn important difference between the three languages concerns their morphological complexity. This study investigates the role of phonological and morphological information in children's developing language.
